javadoc: Created by PluginTool to manage the set of Options for each category.

methods.javadoc:
Constructor
@param tool associated with this OptionsManager
methods.name: <init>

methods.javadoc:
Get the options for the given category name.
@param category name of category
methods.name: getOptions
methods.comment: Get the options for the given category name.

methods.name: registerOptionNameChanged
methods.comment:
Updates saved options from an old name to a new name.  NOTE: this must be called before
 any calls to register or get options.

params.name: oldName
params.comment: the old name of the options.

params.name: newName
params.comment: the new name of the options.

methods.name: hasOptions
methods.comment: Return whether an Options object exists for the given category.

return.comment: true if an Options object exists

methods.javadoc:
Shows Options Dialog with the section called 'category' being displayed
@param category The category of options to have displayed
methods.name: showOptionsDialog
methods.comment: Shows Options Dialog with the section called 'category' being displayed

params.name: category
params.comment: The category of options to have displayed

methods.javadoc: Get the list of options for all categories.
methods.name: getOptions
methods.comment: Get the list of options for all categories.

methods.name: deregisterOwner
methods.comment:
Deregister the owner from the options; if options are empty, then
 remove the options from the map.

methods.name: getConfigState
methods.comment:
Write this object out; first remove any unused options so they
 do not hang around.

return.comment: XML element containing the state of all the options

methods.javadoc:
Restore Options objects using the given XML Element.
@param root element to use to restore the Options objects
methods.name: setConfigState
methods.comment: Restore Options objects using the given XML Element.

params.name: root
params.comment: element to use to restore the Options objects

methods.javadoc: Show the dialog to edit options.
methods.name: editOptions
methods.comment: Show the dialog to edit options.

name: OptionsManager
comment: Created by PluginTool to manage the set of Options for each category.
